resources.string: Please note that without Internet connection you won\'t receive new daily track or be able to watch current ones through the YouTube player.

List is empty.. 
 
 Use button located in the top right corner to add first artist ;) 
 Or visit settings and enable app author playlist!
Song list is currently empty :(\n Add at least one artist to begin.
If enabled 3vry app author playlist will be included in artists section. Recommended option. My playlist contains very wide range of genres. Maybe you will find something interesting :)
This parameter defines how many tracks are considered into process of choosing track. Tracks are ordered by views amount to prevent odd outcomes. You can change the range using below button.
Specify the duration of videos found in YouTube service. Note that this option applies only to the tracks found from specific artist.
Enable this option to include in YouTube searching pool songs with phrase \'acoustic\' in the title. This feature does not apply to app author playlist.
Toggle this option to include in searching pool songs with phrase \'cover\' in the title. This feature does not apply to app author playlist.
Use icons and/or buttons to adjust settings
When enabled, videos with phrase \'live\' won\'t be ignored while searching new song. This feature does not apply to app author playlist.
New song added to your list!
There is no artists to add new song.
Are you sure you want to delete?

What is 3vry?

Open source application created by github.com/trolit using Kotlin language that allows user to add favourite artists and get randomly single track offer each day from YouTube. It\'s also possible to include app author playlist(visit Settings section).

3vry requires Internet permission to make requests to YouTube service. App does not gather any personal data and source code is available at:

https://github.com/trolit/3vry

Why 3vry?

By making 3vry I mainly wanted to meet Kotlin and IntelliJ IDEA IDE after Xamarin.Forms project but also make an app that will encourage to listen to at least one track each day. Listening to music has powerful impact on human mind. Music is very crucial in games and movies. Maybe with this tool you will find track(s) that you did not hear previously and get another favourite song(s)? Enjoy :)

~Pawe≈Ç Idzikowski(trolit)
23.06.2020

Before you enter..

Please consider adding at least one artist or enabling app author playlist from settings section in order to receive your first track offer:)

Reminder

You won\'t receive next track(s) unless you add at least one artist or enable app author playlist from settings menu.

Warning!

This operation removes all songs listed in the application. After clicking YES you cannot undo that operation. Are you sure?
